description:
Welcome to Engamori, the cozy town where supernatural beings are your friendly neighbors. For generations and to this day, the otherworldly Yokai and humans have continued to protect their easygoing way of life. Enjoy the mountain breeze and uncover the mysterious bonds that lie within.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Youkai
tags.description: Prominently features supernatural creatures from Japanese folklore.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Rural
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the countryside.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Alternate Universe
tags.description: Features multiple alternate universes in the same series.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Anthropomorphism
tags.description: Contains non-human character(s) that have attributes or characteristics of a human being.

tags.name: Family Life
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a family unit.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Amnesia
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) with memory loss.

tags.name: Gods
tags.description: Prominently features a character of divine or religious nature.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

node.description: Kenta Tsuboi is a background artist.
Emiko Onodera is a digital painter.

**[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQY7gFOuu0hF2v56CjfOXbA) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kuboaoi_desu) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/kuboaoi_official) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@kuboaoi_music) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/6tQv9pBC2QYU5InvkNoN0k?si=i879Jv6LRwWj6_gGAOXJJQ)**

**Aoi Kubo** is a Japanese vocalist and lyricist who began her music career at the age of 15 in August 2020.

title.native: ほんとにあった! 霊媒先生
同居人はひざ、時々、頭のうえ。
妖怪アパートの幽雅な日常
いなり、こんこん、恋いろは。
いなり、こんこん、恋いろは。いなり、コンコン、蝉しぐれ。
劇場版 夏目友人帳 ～うつせみに結ぶ～
